product_id.description: The ID of the `Product` to which the resource belongs.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

page.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

limit.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

blocks.data: An array of `BulkPricingRule` objects and metadata.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce bulk pricing rules API.

items.description: Rules that offer price discounts based on quantity breaks.

quantity_min.description: The minimum inclusive quantity of a product to satisfy this rule. Must be greater than or equal to zero.

quantity_max.description: The maximum inclusive quantity of a product to satisfy this rule. Must be greater than the `quantity_min` value â€“ unless this field has a value of 0 (zero), in which case there will be no maximum bound for this rule.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Values: `price` - the adjustment amount per product; `percent` - the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; `fixed` - the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The value of the adjustment by the bulk pricing rule.

id.description: The ID of the bulk pricing rule.
